content.question: Let <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the shaded region in the first quadrant bounded by the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis, the <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis, and the graph of <math alttext="y equals, 1 plus cosine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>‚Å°</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>, as shown in the figure. topic.text: 8.9: Volume with Disc Method - Revolving Around the x- or y-Axis

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
